channel.title: D4 on 여러가지

item.title: SWEA - Python - D4
item.description: 1210. Ladder1 for _ in range(10): T = input() ladder = [list(map(int, input().split()))for _ in range(100)] j = 0 for x in range(100): if ladder[99][x] == 2: j = x start_p = 0 i = 99 while i >= 0: if j - 1 >= 0 and ladder[i][j-1] == 1: while 0 <= j - 1 < 100 and ladder[i][j-1] == 1: j -= 1 elif j + 1 < 100 and ladder[i][j+1] == 1: while 0 <= j + 1 < 100 and ladder[i][j+1] == 1: j += 1 i -= 1 print(f"#{T} {j}") 1211.
